attributes.action: Strip the Sultan of Brunei of his knighthoods
attributes.additional_details:
The Sultan of Brunei has instituted harsh new laws in his Kingdom which violate every UK standard of human rights, including stoning homosexuals and adulterers and executing Converts to Christianity.

He holds high commissions in the RAF and Navy and two Knighthoods, GCB and GCMG. We want no part in such oppressive and regressive actions and demand that he be stripped of these honours forthwith.
